lyric: 作词 : TetraCalyx
作曲 : 蔡近翰Zoe(HOYO-MiX)/TetraCalyx
编曲 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
制作人 : 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
Some deserts on this planet were oceans once
translation: 这颗星球上的一些沙漠曾是海洋

lyric: Somewhere shrouded by the night, the sun will shine
translation: 被黑夜笼罩的地方，也会迎来光明

lyric: Sometimes I see a dying bird fall to the ground
translation: 偶尔也会见到濒死的鸟跌落地面

lyric: But it used to fly so high
translation: 但它也曾展翅高飞

lyric: I thought I were no more than a bystander till I felt a touch so real
translation: 我本以为我不过是个旁观者 直到我感觉到如此真实的触觉

lyric: I will no longer be a transient when I see smiles with tears
translation: 当我看到人们含泪的微笑 我便不再是个匆匆过客

lyric: If I have never known the sore of farewell and pain of sacrifices
translation: 如果不曾知晓生离死别的伤痛

lyric: What else should I engrave on my mind
translation: 我又该将什么铭记于心

lyric: Frozen into icy rocks, that's how it starts
translation: 冰冻成石一般的开端

lyric: Crumbled like the sands of time, that's how it ends
translation: 沙漏崩落一般的终结

lyric: Every page of tragedy is thrown away burned out in the flame
translation: 悲剧的每一页已被焚烧殆尽

lyric: A shoulder for the past
translation: 给过往一个肩膀

lyric: Let out the cries imprisoned for so long
translation: 让久被禁锢的哭泣得以放声

lyric: A pair of wings for me at this moment
translation: 给此刻的自己一双翅膀

lyric: To soar above this world
translation: 翱翔于世界之上

lyric: Turn into a shooting star that briefly shines but warms up every heart
translation: 化为一颗流星，给每个心灵一瞬的希望

lyric: May all the beauty be blessed
translation: 愿所有的美好都能得到祝福

lyric: May all the beauty be blessed
translation: 愿所有的美好都能得到祝福

lyric: I will never go
translation: 我不会离开

lyric: There's a way back home
translation: 这就是我们的归途

lyric: Brighter than tomorrow and yesterday
translation: 比过往与未来都要更加闪耀着

lyric: May all the beauty be blessed
translation: 愿所有的美好都能得到祝福

lyric: Wave good-bye to the past when hope and faith have grown so strong and sound
translation: 当希望和信念羽翼丰满，就向昨日告别吧

lyric: Unfold this pair of wings for me again
translation: 再一次为我张开这双羽翼

lyric: To soar above this world
translation: 翱翔于世界之上

lyric: Turned into a moon that always tells the warmth and brightness of the sun
translation: 化为月亮长久地传达着太阳的光耀

lyric: May all the beauty be blessed
translation: 愿所有的美好都能得到祝福

lyric: May all the beauty be blessed
translation: 愿所有的美好都能得到祝福

lyric: 人声录音 Recording: 徐威@52HzStudio
弦乐 Strings: 龙之艺交响乐团
混音 Mixing Engineer: 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
母带 Mastering Engineer: 宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
